the change is needed all other the place here,
or maybe you just want to fix this one?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

PTAL

I was testing earlier with just the version of shift1.go in the gccgo testsuite.  I tested with the current version of shift1.go and came up with these adjustments.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=cd9ad6c8f136 ***

test/shift1.go: recognize gccgo errors

R=golang-dev, remyoudompheng, iant

subject: code review 10524045: test/shift1.go: recognize gccgo error after CL 10467043
